title: Best of the Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly & Riley Moore | 8/26/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss Facebook's CEO Mark Zuckerberg's recent comments on the suppression of the Hunter Biden laptop story in 2020, where he seemingly painted the FBI as the primary suppressor. Bill O’Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, discussing President Biden’s student loan forgiveness and his abuse of executive orders. West Virginia state treasurer Riley Moore joins to put Texas on notice for its lack of serious action against ESG-supporting financial institutions. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
